#Text=Glasgow inmate John Clark accused of murder in Barlinnie prison
#Text=Tuesday , March 25 , 2014
#Text=Self-portrait of alleged victim Colin Penrose in 2011 .
#Text=Image : Colin Penrose .
#Text=John Clark appeared at Glasgow Sheriff Court on Friday charged with murdering cellmate Colin Penrose , 22 , in the city 's Barlinnie prison .
#Text=Penrose , from the West Coast town of Oban , had been recalled to prison for alleged further offending after being paroled from a sentence for sexual assault against a teenager .
#Text=Police Scotland confirmed they were called to the prison , Scotland 's largest , shortly after 2:00am on Thursday when Penrose was found dead in the cell .
#Text=Clark has been remanded pending a full committal hearing next week .
#Text=Clark is variously reported to be either 21 or 22 .
#Text=Penrose died on the top floor of the jail 's E Hall .
#Text=E Hall includes accommodation for vulnerable prisoners .
#Text=Penrose , who attended Oban High School , is survived by his parents , both 60 .
#Text=He listed himself on Facebook as single but had liked a dating page , and according to his profile was seeking employment .
#Text=" I hate football and I hate the police " , his profile reads , adding he enjoyed a drink at the weekend .
#Text=In early 2012 he uploaded a photo of himself with a swollen eye .
#Text=Without explaining the injury he asked " does [ anybody want ] to say anything about my eyes in this picture or do [ you not ] give a shit [ what ] happens to me " ?
#Text=He received no response until a year later , when the reply " thats what happens to beasts ! !

#Text=Peterhead prison has been replaced with the £ 140 million  super prison " HMP Grampian , built next door to the Peterhead site .

column1: #Text=Men , women , and young offenders are all held at the prison for the first time at a Scottish jail and the first inmates arrived this month .
#Text=Aberdeen prison has also closed and been replaced with the new jail .
#Text=Homicide behind bars is unusual in Scotland , though there have been cases in 2006 and 1996 .
#Text=Neighbouring England has seen a spate recently , including four last year .
#Text=Those four deaths were all charged as murder and represented the highest England and Wales total since 1998 .
